DOC.brief_summary: The goal study demonstrate whether switch insulin therapy oral therapy pioglitazone/glimepiride lead deterioration glycemic control ( increase HbA1c 0.5 % ) within 6 month observation period .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Effects Pioglitazone Type II Diabetic Patients Previously Treated With Insulin
DOC.detailed_description: To demonstrate reconvert type 2 diabetic patient insulin treatment oral treatment use pioglitazone combination without glimepiride possible without deterioration blood glucose control . Primary aim maintain glycaemic control ( HbA1c ) define increase HbA1c 0.5 % 6 month treatment ( visit 7 ) compare baseline HbA1c value ( screen visit V1 ) .
